name: LandBox
description:
Create your own world Using Landboxers. Use tools, and your magic backpack full of blocks to bring your imagination to life. Edit, create and do whatever you want in your world, Choose the size. Decide on the name, and invite online friends to meet you. Landbox is a fantastic creative way to create anything you want. You add Featured Thumbnail, and your world is featured for others to visit. Landbox has fun worlds with games and lots of fun.

CHOOSE YOUR LAND PLOT


You decide the size of your terrain, there are currently 10 types of sizes.
50x50, 100x100, 150x150, 200x200, 250x250, 300x300, 350x350, 400x400, 450x450, 500x500

DIFFERENT BIOMES


The terrain has several types of Biomes, such as forests, deserts, savannas, among others, which facilitates their creation.

LOCAL AND PUBLIC MODE


You can create your world locally, and when you think it's ready, you can publish it, and thousands of users will be able to visit and enjoy your world.

GAME TOOLS


You can add physics to your world, weapons, enemies, and create strategies so that other visitors can have fun in your world and interact more.

WHAT GAME CAN I CREATE WITH GAME TOOLS?


A shooter, may the best man win, a battle royale of his own, an adventure game, a platform game with enemies, we give you the tool and you create.

BEST WORLDS


The best worlds are highlighted by the most accessed or those with the most Likes.

TOOLS


You can, in addition to editing the world, add resources to create your own experience or even a game within the Landbox world.
Add Mobs to your world, weapons, ammo, platforms and rules to your world to create your own experience.
